author: Second Wind
description:
This video brought to you by Nordcurrent Labs and their upcoming game Chains of Freedom, a high-stakes, turn-based tactics game inspired by classics like XCOM – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2994010/Chains_of_Freedom/

This week on Unpacked, we’re focusing on and analysing in detail two updates to stories I’ve previously covered this year. First up is the closure of Mountaintop Studios and their free-to-play game, Spectre Divide, and after that, we’ll be talking about the weird narrative around Assassin’s Creed Shadows and how people somehow thought one game would save Ubisoft from its current troubles.

Intro - 00:00
Spectre Divide’s Failure - 00:35
Assassin's Creed Shadows - 06:12

title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Was Never Going to Save Ubisoft | Unpacked
